FeatureSet.description: Specifies the feature set supported by the new organization. Each feature set supports different levels of functionality.
FeatureSet.markdownDescription:
Specifies the feature set supported by the new organization. Each feature set supports different levels of functionality.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ALL | CONSOLIDATED_BILLING  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.description: The unique identifier (ID) of an organization.
Id.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier (ID) of an organization.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^o-[a-z0-9]{10,32}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an organization.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an organization.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws.*:organizations::\d{12}:organization\/o-[a-z0-9]{10,32}  
Update requires: No interruption

ManagementAccountArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the account that is designated as the management account for the organization.
ManagementAccountArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the account that is designated as the management account for the organization.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws.*:organizations::\d{12}:account\/o-[a-z0-9]{10,32}\/\d{12}  
Update requires: No interruption

ManagementAccountId.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the management account of an organization.
ManagementAccountId.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier (ID) of the management account of an organization.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^\d{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ManagementAccountEmail.description: The email address that is associated with the AWS account that is designated as the management account for the organization.
ManagementAccountEmail.markdownDescription:
The email address that is associated with the AWS account that is designated as the management account for the organization.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 6  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: [^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+  
Update requires: No interruption

RootId.description: The unique identifier (ID) for the root.
RootId.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier (ID) for the root.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^r-[0-9a-z]{4,32}$  
Update requires: No interruption
